Name: Amatitan Twist
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The sublime taste of great añejo tequila mellowed and delicately flavoured with maraschino, Chartreuse and grapefruit bitters.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2010 by Dave West at Trio Bar and Grill in Leeds, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Amatitan Twist contains 176 calories
